job_title: Adjunct Professor in Institute, WV
pros:
-Small departments allows for smaller classes that enable you to be more hands on and offer more individualized instruction to students. 
-Closer working relationships with other faculty and staff
-Caring faculty and staff, always available to lend a helping hand
-Ability to strengthen your own personal teaching style
-Allowed to design and implement your own syllibi and choose your own texts, within reason of course
-New University President, making positive changes
cons:
-Low pay scale campus wide. 
-$1500.00 per class taught per semester. Two class limit per semester for Adjuncts.
-No benefits for long term part-time or Adjuncts
-Purchase your own parking pass from a low salary. 
-Delayed payment schedule for Adjuncts, usually mid-tern before you see any salary payments
-No room for advancement due to budget issues
-Low departmental budgets
-Academic facilities and academic equipment is in desperate need of upgrade compared to other local collegiate settings
